text: Pedro de Munébregan (died 1504) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Mondoñedo (1498–1504)."Bishop Pedro de Munébregan" Catholic- Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved September 5, 2016"Diocese of Mondoñedo-Ferrol" Catholic-Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved February 29, 2016"Diocese of Mondoñedo–Ferrol" GCatholic.org. Gabriel Chow. Retrieved February 29, 2016 ==Biography== In 1498, Pedro de Munébregan was appointed during the papacy of Pope Alexander VI as Bishop of Mondoñedo. He served as Bishop of Mondoñedo until his death in 1504. == References == Category:15th- century Roman Catholic bishops Category:16th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Alexander VI Category:1504 deaths
title: Pedro de Munébrega
